verses.roman:
nija nija bhāva sabe śreṣṭha kari' māne
nija-bhāve kare kṛṣṇa-sukha āsvādane

synonyms: nija nija—each his own; bhāva—mood; sabe—all; śreṣṭha kari'-making the best; māne—accepts; nija-bhāve—in his own mood; kare—does; kṛṣṇa-sukha—happiness with Lord Kṛṣṇa; āsvādane—tasting.
translation: Each kind of devotee feels that his sentiment is the most excellent, and thus in that mood he tastes great happiness with Lord Kṛṣṇa.
